name: The Love T-shirt
description: Share The Love with Starr Hill and sport our new The Love t-shirt, 100% cotton and available in Pink and Black.

name: Starr Hill Oktoberfest Stein
description: Enjoy a cold one in style with your limited edition .5 L Starr Hill Oktoberfest Stein. Prost!

name: Starr Pils 16 oz. Munique Glass
description: Enjoy our German Pilsner, Starr Pils, in this special 16-oz. glass with the Starr Pil logo on one side and 3-color Starr Hill logo on the other side.

name: Grateful Pale Ale T-shirt
description:
Sport this awesome, 100% cotton super soft tie-dye t-shirt featuring our newest seasonal brew, Grateful Pale Ale!

Also available in 'ombre fade' dye design.

name: Grateful Pale Ale Poster
description:
Our new Jomo Lager poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

11" wide x 17" tall

name: The Love Women's T-shirt
description:
This super soft t-shirt is made of organic Cotton and is a perfect gift for the ladies!

It is a women's size shirt, so it runs a touch small and is fitted.

name: Starr Saison T-shirt
description: This BRAND NEW Starr Saison t-shirt is the softest, best-looking, and most durably constructed t-shirt available anywhere.

name: Starr Hill Zip Hoodie
description: This Dickies brand hoodie features the Starr Hill logo. Hood and body are double-lined for extra comfort.

name: Dark Starr Stout Toffee Chocolate
description: Made with Starr Hill's Dark Starr Stout, this chocolate bark is the perfect snack for those beer lovers with a sweet tooth. It also makes a great gift!

name: Starr Hill Tin Tackers
description:
This 19" decorative tin tacker is the perfect addition to any bar and a great gift!

Available in Starr Hill, The Love and Northern Lights logos.

name: Starr Hill 2L Growler
description: Become a member of the Starr Hill Growler Club! These 2-liter glass vessels make a great gift for beer lovers. The flip-top cap has a rubber seal that keeps beer fresher longer than a screw cap growler.

name: Starr Hill Women's Zip Hoodie by Playback
description:
This brand new women's fit hoodie is made from 100% recycled materials (70% Recycled Cotton & 30% Recycled Polyester).

The front features the Starr logo and the back features the full Starr Hill logo in red across the shoulders.

name: Starr Hill Malt Vinegar
description: Starr Hill Malt Vinegar is made with our Amber Ale by Virginia Vinegar Works. At 4% acidity, it's great on salads and even with french fries!

name: Starr Hill Gift Card
description:
The perfect gift for any beer lover this holiday season!

You can also purchase Starr Hill Gift Cards by calling the Brewery at 1-434-823-5671. Please ask for Gabe Strauss.

This gift card can be redeemed in the Starr Hill Tasting Room only.

name: Virginia Enjoy Local T-Shirt
description:
BUY LOCAL, DRINK LOCAL, ENJOY LOCAL!

Wear this 100% cotton unisex t-shirt while enjoying your favorite Starr Hill brew!

Available in navy with orange logo, maroon with orange logo, purple with yellow logo, black with yellow logo & forest green with yellow logo.

name: Starr Hill Key Chain
description: Attractive and useful, this pewter key chain features the Starr Hill emblem and doubles as a bottle opener!

name: Starr Hill Flag
description: This 3' x 5' Starr Hill indoor flag is a great way to rep your favorite local brewery!

name: Starr Hill Pint Glass
description: These 16 oz. Starr Hill pint glasses are the perfect addition to your bar and make a great gift!

name: Starr Hill Bar Wrench
description: Classic bar-style metal bottle opener in red with Starr Hill emblem.

name: Starr Hill Ice Bucket
description: The perfect 5-quart metal bucket to chill down your favorite Starr Hill brews! It can also be used as a gift basket.

name: Dark Starr Stout T-Shirt
description: This 100% cotton t-shirt features the classic Starr Hill logo on the chest and colorful Dark Starr Stout artwork on the back. A heady shirt for a heady beer!

name: Northern Lights T-Shirt
description: This 100% cotton dark forest green t-shirt features the classic Starr Hill logo on the chest and colorful Northern Lights IPA artwork on the back.

name: Northern Lights Nonic Glass
description: This 16-oz. nonic glass is the perfect glass for a frosty Northern Lights IPA!

name: Festie T-Shirt
description:
This 100% cotton t-shirt features the classic Starr Hill logo on the chest and colorful Festie artwork on the back. Celebrate festival season in style!

Available in heather red and light blue.

name: The Love Hefeweizen Pint Glass
description: The Love Hefeweizen glasses are the perfect addition to your bar and make a great gift!

name: Boxcarr Poster
description: Our new Boxcarr poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

name: Bamboo Polo Shirt
description:
Show off your favorite beer on the golf course! This polo shirt is made from bamboo charcoal with a UPF 50 rating. It has a 3 button placket and flat knit collar, along with the Starr Hill logo on the left sleeve.

Also available in royal blue and red.

name: Starr Hill FlexFit Trucker Hat
description: This new and stylish FlexFit Trucker hat comes in black with a red Starr logo or olive green with a gold Starr logo.

name: Starr Hill Castro Cap
description: Rock this Starr Hill adjustable Castro Cap with embroidered Starr Hill logo on the front and back!

name: The Love Poster
description: Our new The Love poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

name: Amber Ale Poster
description: Our new Amber Ale poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

name: Northern Lights Poster
description: Our new Northern Lights poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

name: Jomo Lager Poster
description: Our new Jomo Lager poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

name: Smoke Out Poster
description: Our new Smoke Out poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

name: Cryptical Poster
description: Our new Cryptical poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

name: Double Platinum Poster
description: Our new Double Platinum poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

name: Dark Starr Stout Poster
description: Our new Dark Starr Stout poster is the perfect addition to your bar or beer collection!

name: Large Starr Hill Belt Buckle
description: Rock your Starr in style with this awesome belt buckle!

name: Small Starr Hill Belt Buckle
description: Rock your Starr in style with this awesome belt buckle!

name: Starr Hill Tap Handle Large
description: There's no better way to enjoy Starr Hill brews on tap than with a large tap handle!

name: Starr Hill Tap Handle Small
description: These small tap handles are a must for collectors--they're the perfect way to serve your favorite Starr Hill beer!

name: Starr Hill Beer Labels
description: A must for collectors. Be sure to include Starr Hill’s unique labels in your collection!
